name: NEAppRule
desc: The identity of an app whose traffic is to be routed through the tunnel.

items.name: init(signingIdentifier: String)
items.desc: Create an app rule that matches an app with a given signing identifier.

items.name: init(signingIdentifier: String, designatedRequirement: String)
items.desc: Create an app rule that matches an app with a given signing identifier and a given designated requirement.

items.name: var matchSigningIdentifier: String
items.desc: The signing identifier of the app that matches the rule.

items.name: var matchDesignatedRequirement: String
items.desc: The designated requirement of the app that matches the rule.

items.name: var matchPath: String?
items.desc: The file system path of the app that matches the rule.

items.name: var matchDomains: [Any]?
items.desc: The hostname domains that match the rule.
